summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4416 for the improvement of 50th Avenue Southwest, from West Morgan Street to the North line of Tract 59, Spring Hill Park; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52196, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
